divs: sighting detailsi was driving down stewartstown road in morgantown west virginia. i believe it was around march of 2006. it was sometime in the afternoon. it was daylight out. out of the corner of my eye to my right, there was a streak\flash of colors that quickly came and disappeared. i am guessing the distance was about a mile away and it was not very high in the sky. all i saw was a trail of colors - yellow, orange, red, green, blue - like a trail of gasses. i did not see an acutal object, just the streak of colors, and they disappeared as quickly as they came. it lasted just a few seconds. it went from right to left and at a slight angle upward towards the sky. i've never seen anything like it.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Morgantown
There were no other sightings in Morgantown on or around March 15th 2009
Summary: Flash of colors across the sky
